short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you to rememeber to take a break

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set custom reminders to help prevent back problems, muscle cramps, and eye strain.

Take A Break allows you to set custom reminders at custom intervals to help remind you to take a break while sitting at the computer. 

Customizable options:
- Timer enabled/disabled
- Frequency of reminders
- Exercise suggestions (WIP)
